trans-unit.source: Manipulates a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> that has been applied by a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> action.

## Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a ControllableStoryboardAction object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.

If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.

Gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> that began the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> you want to interactively control.

The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> that began the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> you want to interactively control.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
